name: Subject
description:
I tried making a fun and hard platformer. Collect as many samples as possible before the red floor gets you. The higher you get, the harder it gets(trust me I've tried).
I've provided some pictures of strategies, but I think you will figure it out.
CONTROLS
LEFT - > LEFT ARROW KEY
RIGHT-> RIGHT ARROW KEY
JUMP -> X
SOCIAL MEDIA
